title: LFM TeGC
body:
Hey there, TeGC are looking for new members!

Currently looking for an ADC and a Jungle sub.

Needs to be in bronze/silver currently in flex.

Opportunity for skill development is there.

Please leave these details in comments below.

---------------------------

Summoner Name:
Solo Rank:
Flex Rank:
Position:
Best Champions:
Why Do You Want To Join A Team?

-------------------------

replies.body:
Summoner Name: DG Meteos

Solo Rank: Silver 3

Flex Rank: Silver 1

Position: Jungle (Main) / Top/Mid (Off)

Best Champions: JG( Kindred, Evelynn, Hecarim) Top (Nasus, Jax, Tryndamere) Mid ( Ziggs, Malzahar, Twisted Fate)

Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: I like playing with people and working as a team. I've played on teams before in Zealot Gaming and Define Gaming and would like to do so again.
add me and message in client

Summoner Name: Glewis

Solo Rank: Gold V

Flex Rank: Bronze IV

Position: ADC

Best Champions: Caitlyn, Varus, Jinx, Ezreal, Miss Fortune, Twitch

Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: I wanna find people to improve at the game with, and enjoy playing in a team environment. I've played for Tactical Gaming in the past and would like to join such a team again

Summoner Name: xSynx

Solo Rank: B4 Getting to b3 soon hopefully.

Flex Rank: Unranked due to not having anyone to team with on a regular basis.

Position: ADC (Main)/Jungle (Off)

Best Champions: Varus, Jinx, MF, Ashe (Any adc really, with a reliable support)

Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: Solo queue can be a bit dull at times, looking for something different and maybe progress a bit in the game. Being bronze, I still have a lot to learn and maybe I can take away some of this knowledge into solo queue and raise my MMR.
hi i play jung/support add me silver 5 silver 5
please leave all necessary information requested in the comments
